scripts.pre-deploy: if [ -f ../deploy/Catenis.tar.gz ]; then t=`stat -t %C%y-%m-%d -f %Sm ../deploy/Catenis.tar.gz`; mv ../deploy/Catenis.tar.gz "../deploy/Catenis.$t.tar.gz"; fi; (cd ..; tar -czf deploy/Catenis.tar.gz --exclude '.*DS_Store' --exclude '.meteor/local' --exclude '*.log' --exclude '*.log.????-??-??' --exclude 'local.json' --exclude 'node_modules' --exclude 'seed*.dat' meteor_app)
